item.description:
Come watch Ireland win the rugby six nations grand slam for the first time since 1948. However they are playing Wales (Grand slam champions 1908, 1909, 1911, 1950, 1952, 1971, 1976, 1978, 2005, 2008) so anything could happen!

There is a $20 entry fee to Lir.
item.how_to_find_us: My cell number is (617)-315-3962 and Ruth's is (617)-800-4814 to find us.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Wales V Ireland Six Nations Rugby Final
